Replying to @GatsbyJS 2018-09-26 20:53
@gatsbyjs @presentday @Netlify Cache management is tricky so we simplify it for you by not exposing cache controls between the immutable, atomic builds. but... there is a way to manually cache things between builds on @Netlify. Just be careful! @stefanjudis of @contentful blogged it: https://t.co/ozAnzcc2VF
